summary:
A French citizen born in The Netherlands, I grew up in Germany and studied Business Administration in Switzerland and Hungary, graduating from the University of St. Gallen. During my doctoral research about multicultural R&D teams, I examined the performance the world's most preeminent particle physicists at the Large Hadron Collider in Geneva.

I moved to China in 2003, where I successfully developed various entrepreneurial ventures in software distribution. As CEO at AsiaAnalytics (formerly SPSS China, co-founded in 2006), I turned the company from an SPSS Inc. (now IBM) Master Distributor into a leading provider of analytics consulting services. I also gained experience in the finance (Deloitte), advertising (Publicis Media), FMCG and chemical (Henkel) industries. At Ingka (IKEA Retail), my mandate is to support the company's digital transformation by driving the adoption of data in decision making. 

I have worked on projects delivering solutions for media planning and buying, CRM, loyalty programs, marketing efficiency, consumer insights, product development, operations optimisation, business modelling, etc. My consulting experience ranges from automotive, cosmetics, FMCG, and luxury, through retail and e-commerce to hospitality and telecommunications.

I have a great passion for sports analytics and Chinese proverbs.

profile_positions.title: Analytics Services Manager at Ingka Digital | IKEA
Decision Intelligence Manager at Ingka Digital | IKEA

profile_positions.description:
Corporate administration of data, analytics, and technology aspects in the context of Henkel's digital transformation

Responsibilities: Definition of the data and technology foundation; support creation of a hybrid data management architecture (covering on-premises, Spark, and cloud environments); development of data strategies, roadmaps and programs supporting customer-centricity; alignment of business (BUs and functions) and IT teams on data strategies; identification, scoping and delivery of analytics and AI (artificial intelligence) use cases; establishment of data governance standards and procedures meant to ensure data quality and accountability; building up of data and analytics capabilities via upskilling and talent incubation; strengthening of a data-driven culture through change management.
profile_positions.title: Corporate Director - Analytics & Digital Technology

profile_positions.description:
Supervision and development of the Publicis Media's Analytics practice in Greater China

Responsibilities: Functional leadership of analysts and data scientists; development of measurement and analysis solutions for clients as well as internal media planning and buying teams; extraction of insights from various data sources (proprietary research, brand health tracking, CRM, post-campaign, ad tracking, DMP, etc.) and expression of business recommendations; consulting on the integration of analytics into marketing (strategic and operational) functions; advisory on the use of data sets for various business purposes and applications; development of Publicis Media’s data and ad tech (advertising technology) ecosystem;  formulation and supervision of the development internal apps and tools (such as the Content Predictor, Drama Database, Media Mix Simulator, Media Scheduler).
profile_positions.title: General Manager - Analytics

profile_positions.description:
Development of Deloitte's analytics practice in China. 

Acquisition and management of engagements in data analytics as related to CRM, customer experience, omnichannel retailing, supply chain management, fraud detection, risk compliance, etc. 

Consultancy about both the technical (in particular data management, data preparation, visualisation, predictive modelling, deployment) and business aspects of analytics and digital transformation (strategy, organisation, change management).
profile_positions.title: Director - Data Analytics

profile_positions.description:
Responsibilities: Development and execution of overall corporate strategy; full P&L responsibility; management of the transition from SPSS Master Distributor (software / license-driven business) to analytics service company (solutions and consulting); orchestration of cultural change (increase overall professionalism, account management, partnership mentality, internal CRM system, etc.); business planning; leadership of a cross-functional team (sales, consultants, engineers and administration); design and implementation of sales incentive programs; development and execution of direct and digital marketing strategies; consulting and project management; business development and account management; communication and public relations.

Consulting projects: CRM, loyalty management, omni-channel marketing strategy, customer-centric marketing, marketing efficiency, data-driven business modelling, customer experience management, consumer insights, cultural change, analytics best practice, analytics ROI, etc.

Industry experience: Retail, consumer goods, cosmetics, luxury, e-commerce, automotive, insurance, hospitality, casino, pharmaceuticals, telecommunications, etc.

Company description: See below (SPSS China - now AsiaAnalytics)
profile_positions.title: Chief Executive Officer

profile_positions.description:
(After sale of the company to Openbase Inc.)
Consulting in CRM (Customer Management Relationship), data-driven marketing, predictive modelling and statistical analysis.

Responsibilities: Development of SPSS China's professional services business unit (pipeline, timesheet, rewards, etc.); Business planning; Budgeting; P&L monitoring; business development (market seeding, lead generation); sales (proposal, proof of concept, deal closing and execution); supervision and management of analytics projects; quality control of deliverables (ultimate responsibility towards client); recruitment, support, coaching, and motivation of team members; design and execution of marketing activities (promotions, campaigns, events, etc.); established partnerships with market research and other agencies (CRM, digital and loyalty marketing).

Consulting projects: Analytical CRM (customer segmentation, multi-channel campaign optimisation, customer life time management, direct and database marketing, cross- / up-selling, etc.); Marketing efficiency (media mix modelling, pricing, brand perception, attribution modelling, marketing ROI, demand forecasting,etc.); Product development and testing; Consumer Insights and Intelligence; Staffing optimisation; Planning, selection and deployment of CRM strategies and systems; Design and implementation of loyalty programs.

Techniques and tools: Statistical analysis (descriptive and inferential statistics); Exploratory Data Mining, Predictive Modelling, Data visualisation; SPSS Statistics; SPSS Modeler; Excel 

Industry experience: Retail, consumer goods, cosmetics, luxury, e-commerce, automotive, insurance, hospitality, casino, pharmaceuticals, telecommunications, etc.
profile_positions.title: Consulting Director

profile_positions.description:
Responsibilities: Business planning and budgeting; development, establishment and supervision of business procedures and compliance system (organisation, staffing, pipeline/funnel management, reporting, order processing, service delivery, etc.); P&L monitoring; design and implementation of key performance indicators (KPIs); supervision of company's daily operations; solving of channel conflicts.

Company description: SPSS China (now AsiaAnalytics) was set up in 2006 as the Master Distributor of SPSS Inc. (now part of IBM) for Mainland China. Over the last 7 years, the company has evolved to become a prime IBM Partner in the region and the country's #1 in the provision of predictive analytics consulting and solutions. Servicing over 2'000 accounts and thousands of end users, our customer base spans across academic, public and commercial organisations. Our clients all share the vision of using their existing data to make more accurate evidence based decisions in their respective organisations – no matter the industry or function they operate in, or business problems they need to solve. Our success has been based upon our ability to demonstrate the very real benefits that the use of analytical technology provides. Underlying this ability is our collective passion and conviction as a company that analysing data, and incorporating the results into the decision-making process, leads to better decisions.
profile_positions.title: Co-Founder & COO

profile_positions.description:
Responsibilities: 
1) Opco Co-Founder & COO: Contacting of overseas software vendors to promote STG as a reliable and effective distribution partner for Greater China; negotiation of distribution contracts with principals (software vendors); business planning; development, establishment and supervision of business procedures and rules in several Operating Companies (“Opco”) of the Group; reported to Opco CEO and to principals' respective manager (Worldwide Sales, Asia Pacific, etc.);

2) Alliances Director: Relationship Management and Business Development with STG principals' Global Partners in China; channel management (local distribution partners); execution of go-to-market plans with principals' Global Accounts; account management (multinational accounts), pre- and post-sales consulting;

3) Performance Management Consultant: Development, definition, and delivery of performance management solutions; implementation of Business Intelligence projects; design of Key Performance Indicators and Balanced Scorecards.

Project experience: Business Intelligence, Enterprise Performance Management (EPM), Customer Relationship Management (CRM), sales and marketing metrics, market segmentation, sales analysis

Group Opcos:
- SPSS China (sold to Openbase Inc. in 2008)
- i2 - China Master Distributor (Visual Analysis, Investigative Analysis)
- DataFirst (Master Distributor of Pervasive, Integration / ETL)
- FirstBI (Master Distributor of MicroStrategy, Business Intelligence)
- FirstEPM (Balanced Scorecard / Enterprise Performance Management software)
profile_positions.title: Alliances Director & Opco COO

profile_positions.description: Reporting on the watches and jewellery industries; market and business intelligence analyses (sell-in / sell-out); retailer segmentation; channel stra­tegy and marketing mix recommen­dations; design of CRM system (VIP program); development of perfor­mance monitoring tools (processes, metrics, data collection, etc.); implementation and training of retail best practice.
profile_positions.title: Business Analyst - Ebel (Watches)

profile_positions.description: Financial modelling, Analysis, Reporting, Due Diligence
profile_positions.title: Summer Analyst
